Therefore, the profound friends follow and gather, and the divine plan continues to be proclaimed.

In order to level the obstacles of the Way and prevent the resentment of the mind, spreading intimacy to the ignorant masses and opening up the vast path of emotions, although the slander is worse than spears and arrows, and the harm is as extreme as grinding to powder, it is necessary to internally eliminate the thought of self and externally resist the notion of others. Seeing that the neighboring void has intervals, how can a thrown blade injure?
Contemplate that the mechanism has no master, and the struck boat is no different.
I have no self, and who else has a self?
It is like a great flood filling the empty sky, yet the sky has no fear of drowning;

How much more so for the already past sounds, where praise and slander are the same;
The already departed forms, where harm and benefit are treated equally.
If you greatly desire to benefit them with happiness, how could you add suffering to them?
If there is no harm coming, then there is no way to embrace and accept;
If there is no past compassion, then there is no basis for the practice of bodhi.
Instead, they become good friends and receive profound kindness. Hearing insults is more enjoyable than silk and bamboo music, and receiving beatings is more delightful than being held and carried.
When the prince lost both eyes, he never had two minds;

In their responsive communication, a hundred spears gather in the body, and the marks of a hundred blessings open;
Ten thousand afflictions entwine the body, and the foundation of ten thousand virtues is established.
In their utilization, they remotely accord with non-arising, bowing to the dust in their realization of purity;
Remotely contributing to great renunciation, they equally cut the left and right.
Comparing it to shame and modesty as clothing, then the dragon robe is not as splendid;
If it is used to resist afflictions and form armor, then the rhinoceros's horn can be thanked for its hardness.
If speaking of its great power, then uprooting a mountain cannot be used as a metaphor;
If discussing its fearlessness, then a brave person cannot compare.
